get_video_list[source]

get_video_list()

Get a list of all generated videos from your deep word account

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

get_video_list will return a list, one of those elements can be passed to download video

{% raw %}

download_video[source]

download_video()

Download synthetic video generated in your deep word account

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

download_all_videos[source]

download_all_videos()

Download all the synthetic videos from your deep word account

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

download_youtube_video[source]

download_youtube_video(url)

Download a youtube video from it's url

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_credits[source]

get_credits()

Get the number of credits left in your deep word account

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Use this function to crop a video

{% raw %}

crop_video[source]

crop_video(video, start, end, outfile=None)

Crop a video in place from start to end. If you don't want to crop inplace, provide output filename. For youtube videos you can download_youtube_video before cropping it

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_resolution[source]

get_resolution(video)

Get the resolution of a video

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert get_resolution('Anna.mp4') == (1280, 720)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_fps[source]

get_fps(video)

Get the fps of a video

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_fps('Anna.mp4')

30
{% endraw %}
